name: Fan cleaning tutorial
reply:
## 🧼 Redmagic Internal Fan Cleaning Tutorial by <@292308639316967435> 

Want to keep your Redmagic cool and clean? Here's how to safely clean the internal fan! 🌀

---

### 🔧 What You’ll Need:
- 🪥 *Dry toothbrush* (optional, for dust buildup)
- 💨 *Canned air* (or similar air pressure)
- 📱 Your Redmagic phone

---

### 🪛 Steps:

1. 🔌 **Turn the phone OFF**  
   Make sure the device is powered down to avoid any damage.

2. 📦 **Remove the phone case** *(if you have one)*

3. 🪥 **Brush off dust**  
   Gently use a toothbrush to remove **larger particles** from the **intake vent**  
   - 🧩 *On the 7 series: it's on the back*  
   - 📏 *On other models: it's on the side*  
   *(You can skip this step if your fan isn't too dusty)*

4. ↘️ **Tilt the phone sideways**  
   Make sure the **air outtake vent points DOWNWARD** — this helps dust fall out more easily!

5. 💨 **Blow air into the intake vent**  
   Use **short, strong bursts** with canned air. Repeat a few times until clean.

6. 🔄 **Turn the phone back ON**  
   Set the **internal fan to MAX RPM** for about **10 seconds** to flush out any remaining dust.

---

### 🎉 Aaaand your done!
Cleaning regularly helps performance and fan longevity!

---

[Watch on YouTube](https://youtu.be/XcpJrl9gWN0?si=xd-_vml4wXZO5fch)

# Charge Separation (bypass charging) feature things to know

- The Charge Separation feature operates under the following conditions:
Manual Reactivation Required:
- If the charger cable is disconnected while Charge Separation is active, the feature will automatically deactivate.

Subsequent reconnection of the charger will not automatically reactivate Charge Separation:
--> manual re-enablement is required.

Deactivation Upon Charger Connection:
- When connecting a charger after activating Charge Separation, the feature will automatically deactivate. To continue using charge separation, you must manually re-enable the function.
Automatic Time Limit:
- The charge separation function automatically deactivates after 12 hours of continuous operation.

# Some Suggestions of Optimizing Battery Life and Extending Standby Time

To maximize battery efficiency and extend standby duration, we recommend the following measures:

1. Enable Power-Saving Modes:
Activate Power Saving Mode or Ultra Power Saving Mode via the quick settings panel.

2. Manage Connectivity:
Disable mobile data and network connections when not required.

3. Optimize Display Settings:
Avoid using live/dynamic wallpapers.
Reduce screen brightness.
Set a shorter screen timeout period.
Select a lower screen refresh rate (e.g., 60Hz or 90Hz).

4. Manage Applications:
Regularly close unused background applications to conserve power and free up RAM.
Perform routine phone memory cleanup.
Navigate to Palm Manager > Battery Management > App Smart Management to disable auto-start and
background activity permissions for non-essential third-party apps.

5. Control 5G Usage:
Be aware that 5G connectivity may increase battery consumption; enable it only as needed.

6. Manage Location Services:
- Disable location services (GPS) when not in use.
Key Recommendation:
For optimal battery performance and extended usage, proactively managing display settings, application behavior, and connectivity options is essential.

name: Why Is My Internet Speed Slow or Unavailable
reply:
# Why Is My Internet Speed Slow or Unavailable?

If you're experiencing slow internet or can't access the internet at all, here are a few common causes and solutions:
Network Type (4G/5G):
If your phone shows a 4G icon, your speed may not be as fast as it used to be.
- Sometimes, your mobile operator may limit speed temporarily.
- Try switching to 5G if available, as it may offer better performance.
- If 5G is unstable or under construction in your area, try using 4G instead.
Switch Network Settings:
- Turn off Smart 5G (if enabled).
- Try toggling off 5G completely to force the phone to use 4G.
These steps can help if 5G coverage is weak or inconsistent.

App Issues:
- close all apps that is running in the background and restart the affected app.
- Check if all apps can't access the internet or if it's just one specific app.
If it's only one app, the issue might be with the app’s server, not your phone or connection.
Check Real-Time Speed:
For example, while watching TikTok, enable the notification & status bar in settings.
- If it shows around 1MB/s, your connection is generally good for videos and browsing.

name: Why Is My Signal Poor or Unstable
reply:
# Why Is My Signal Poor or Unstable?

- Signal strength can vary based on your location and network type.
Key Factors:
Network Coverage:
- Signal strength depends heavily on the local mobile network coverage.
- 5G base stations have shorter range and faster signal drop compared to 4G.
Movement and Signal Drop:
- On 5G, even small movements can lead to signal fluctuation or drop, especially indoors or in rural areas.

Device Performance:
- Phones undergo strict antenna testing before leaving the factory.
- You can compare your phone's signal with another device on the same network (e.g., both using 4G or both using 5G).
--> Signal Bars ≠ Performance:
- Even if 5G shows only 2–3 bars, it should still support calls and internet access reliably under normal conditions.

name: What should I do if the fingerprint sensor isn't working properly
reply:
# What should I do if the fingerprint sensor isn't working properly?

An optical fingerprint sensor has a certain self-learning function, and the unlocking success rate will increase after using it for a period of time.
If it doesn't work, please check the following:
- Do you have a screen protector?
- Is it a tempered screen protector or a thin film?
- Is it purchased from a third party or an official one?
- We recommend that you use the official screen protector (or you don't use a screen protector, resulting in less protection but higher accuracy).
- Screen breakage or cracking may cause the fingerprint unlocking under the screen to be insensitive or ineffective.
- We also recommend contacting the official after-sales service.
- Excessive light may deteriorate the quality of the fingerprint image and affect the fingerprint unlocking.
- Try using it in a place without direct strong light.
- Fingers that are too wet or too dry may cause fingerprint recognition to be insensitive
- Dirt on the fingers or the screen surface may affect the operation of the fingerprint unlocking under the screen.
- Please keep your fingers and the fingerprint area of the screen clean.
- Are your fingers peeling or damaged?

## ⚙️ REDMAGIC Performance Modes Explained

REDMAGIC gives you multiple performance modes so you can control battery life, heat, and raw power — depending on what you’re doing.  
Here’s a quick breakdown of what each mode does and when to use it! 🎮🔋🔥

---

### 🌿 **Eco Mode**  
- ✅ Limits refresh rate to **60Hz**  
- 🔋 Prioritizes **battery life and efficiency**  
- 💤 Best for casual use or when you’re running low on battery  

---

### ⚖️ **Balance Mode** *(Default outside Game Space)*  
- ⚡ A mix of **performance and battery savings**  
- 🔋 Great for everyday use  
- 📱 *All apps outside of Game Space run in this mode by default*

---

### 📈 **Rise Mode**  
- ⚡ Cranks up performance — at the cost of some battery life  
- 🎮 Recommended for **demanding games**  
- 🧊 Might get warm, but nothing extreme

---

### 🔥 **Diablo Mode** *(Extreme Performance)*  
- 🚀 Locks CPU/GPU clock speeds to the **maximum**  
- ❌ Ignores thermal safety limits (yes, seriously)  
- ⚠️ Temps of **90°C+** are not unusual!

## ⚠️ Use ONLY if:
- 🎮 You’re **emulating heavy games**  
- 🔌 You're **plugged into a power outlet**  
- ❄️ You're using an **external cooler** (on top of the internal one!)
